Vindictus.[CMTY] 14 years with Vindictus!:
https://discord.gg/vindictus]on our official Discord[/url] and earn special gifts we've prepared for you!

 

[b]Event Period[/b]
[list][*]October 22, 2024 - November 19, 2024[/*][/list]
 

[b]Q. Out of everyone you've met in Vindictus, who comes to your mind first?[/b]
[list][*]Participate in the event by:[/*][/list]
Share the most memorable person you've met while playing Vindictus!

(A memorable person can be anyone; A friend you play or played Vindictus together, Someone that helped you when you were new, Someone that introduced Vindictus to you, etc.)

Take a screenshot with that person, or at the place with your memories of that person

Explain who or where it is, and episodes related to it; why you decided to share your experience with that person.

 

[b]Rewards:[/b]
[list][*]VVIP Service (7 Days)[/*][*]Unlimited Inner Armor Pass (7 Days, Gift)[/*][*]Unlimited Hair Pass (7 Days, Gift)[/*][*]Gremlin T-Shirt Box[/*][/list]
 
[list][*]If over 90 memories are shared, a coupon code with the rewards will be revealed.[/*][*]Otherwise, it will only be given out to participants.[/*][*]All rewards are character bind, so make sure to collect the rewards from the character you wish to use the items.[/*][/list]
 

[b]Participation Format:[/b]
[list][*]Server:[/*][*]Who you'd like to explain:[/*][*]Your experience with the most memorable person you've met in Vindictus:[/*][*]Screenshot with the person or Screenshot at a memorable place:[/*][/list]
 

[b]Please Note:[/b]
[list][*]Exact names are not necessary, but a detailed explanation on the person or situation is required.[/*][*]Each person can only participate once.[/*][*]Irrelevant posts or Participation with other people's work will not be counted.[/*][*]All rewards will be given during maintenance on November 19, 2024.[/*][*]You can choose the gender of the Gremlin T-Shirt from the selection box from <> - <>[/*][*]The Gremlin T-Shirt is Dyeable.[/*][*]
All submissions may be used in our official social accounts.

Vindictus.[CMTY] GM COIN S4: VindiGhosts:
]{STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/3953157/6aa4521bbfb2ae696d3056e530f6208668bae464.jpg[/img]

[b]Event Period:[/b] 10/15/2024 (Tue) after weekly maintenance - 11/19/2024 (Tue) before weekly maintenance

 

Mercenaries,

The ghosts changed everything in Vindictus to Jack-O-Lanterns and other Halloween Decorations!

Quick, pretend you’re one of them…!

 

How good are you in disguising as a ghost?

Can you not get caught?

 

… Why does that guy over there not have a shadow?

 

[b]Event Info[/b]
[list][*]Share a screenshot on Discord that includes the "Spooky Outfit Set" and "Bat Balloon Box" from the newly added "Witch's Murky Cauldron" event, or a screenshot of you wearing a part of or the entirety of another Halloween-themed costume.[/*][*]Please include a one-line description of the concept of your picture, along with the screenshot.[/*][*]Submitted screenshots and their captions may be used in future social media posts.[/*][*]Each person can participate once, and multiple submissions are not allowed.[/*][/list]
 

[b]Event Rewards[/b]
[list][*]If more than 70 people participate during the event, a coupon for 15 GM Coins will be distributed to all players.[/*][*]If that number of participants is not reached, then the coupon for 15 GM Coins will be distributed only to those who participated.[/*][/list]
